title: 5.1 Master Challenge 2
question: Write a Java program, and ask the user to input the name, username, and domain name like gmail.com or qubitsedu.com. Check whether the username given by the user is equal to the name. If it is equal, print Failed! username and name are identical. Otherwise, concatenate the user name with the domain name to form an email address and print Success! Email created.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
